item.title: Working with Field Relationships
item.description: Piklist relationships allow you to relate any object to any object. In this tutorial we’ll use the classic books example, assuming our post types are book and chapter, and a user can be an author. We’ll cover the post_has, post_belongs, and relate_query parameters. First let’s add the chapter relate field to the book post type. Since this is a post type we’re adding a field to, the file goes in the /parts/meta-boxes/ folder.
